name: 尤尚邦
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。經選定後之題目在第一學期修完時如欲換題目時須在第一學期成績打出後，再徵求原來及新接手老師都同意才可更換題目。
The topic of the special project is discussed and decided together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester. The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.
schedule: 每週依執行成果報告，並隨時討論。
scorePolicy:
1. 平時討論：40%
2. 期末成果：60%
consultation: 教師諮商時間與聯絡請以 email 聯絡預約。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）

name: 陳柏端
objective:
本課程為一門「總整課程」(Capstone course)，由 2-4 位學生組成。與指導教授討論及擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成專題報告。包括培養以下四種能力：1. 整合 (integration)，2. 收尾 (closure)，3. 反思 (reflection)，4. 過渡 (transition)。
This course is a "Capstone course" consisting of 2-4 students. Discuss and formulate the topic of topic research with the guidance professor, conduct experimental research under the guidance of the professor, and write the research results into a special report. Including the cultivation of the following four abilities: 1. integration, 2. closure, 3. reflection, and 4. transition.
schedule:
1-9 周，文獻閱讀、進行實驗
10-18 周，報告撰寫
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）SDG12：負責任的消費與生產（Responsible Consumption and Production）
